attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: Setting and example by the 600 members+ of the 2 houses of Parliament is long overdue and a vocation to public service is being overshadowed by a vocation to self interest and those of financial friends. The resentment will become greater and greater with the public whilst this is allowed to continue continue, with no sensible control & setting of the rules for MPs and related hangers on.

rejection.details: This is a matter for direct communication with Parliament.
reasons: Outside the remit of the Prime Minister and Government
